reviews.review: тупые разрабы занёрфят такого баллансного маньяка который не может кемпить,из-за тупых 20-ток которые ноют что фредди имба,далее занёрфили фонарики теперь норм слепить можно с аддоном на батарейку и линзой,жду дальше ккак они убьют эту игру.

A fun game.

Pros
- Free Stuff from the developers sometimes (new killers, new characters)
- Unique skills for most characters
- Good Lore
- Good ways to get you scared shitless
- Fair amount of maps to play

Cons
- CAMPERS  FRICKIN CAMPERS (I know it can be a strat of some kind but I don't enjoy it when someone is camped for like  3 games in a row)
- No Dedicated Servers (No Problem finding a game just that sometimes the host may lag and it will affect you aswell)
- Glitch-ish sometimes (Sometimes when hit by a killer it will teleport him inside of a wall, this has happened some killers I have gone against, like they hit me and all of the sudden they will be standing on like a pallet)

In the end these cons don't annoy me whatsoever but for some it may do, but I personally enjoy myself while playing, dedicated servers aren't an issue for me because it's like 1/20 game that I encounter a laggy host as a survivor so no issue there. Campers can be handled by a group of survivors, one distracting or two and the other ones attempt the save, Glitches tempt to occure like every 1/20 game aswell so nothing really that matters too much to me. What you can do is maybe find friends to play with so if you do encounter a camper you guys can communicate through somewhere and well plan on how to save the one innocent man/grill on the hook.

시작한 지 2주 된 유저입니다. 친구들과 함께 매일같이 즐겁게 플레이하고 있어요.
처음에는 고객 평가란에 '비매너유저', '버그', '불안정한 서버' 등의 문제로 인해, 부정적 의견들이 많아서, 읽고 구매를 꽤 망설였었는데, 구매 후인 지금은 하루도 빠지지 않고 플레이할 정도로 무척 좋아하는 게임이 되었습니다. 앞에 언급한 문제들이 해결된 것은 아니나, 어느 정도 커버할 수 있을 정도로 즐겁고 원활하게 진행되는 판이 더 많습니다. (그렇기에 안고쳐도 된다는 뜻은 당연 아닙니다) 플레이하는데 필요한 로딩 시간, 그리고 구매비용인 21000원이 아깝지 않을 정도로 만족스럽네요. 돈값을 제대로 하는 게임이라 생각돼, 현재는 DLC도 하나씩 구매하는 중입니다.

+한국어 지원이 완벽하지 않습니다. 그러나 이 점은 워낙 유명한 게임이다보니, 여러 위키, 블로그 등에 잘 소개 되어있어 쉽게 정보를 찾고, 커버하시는 게 가능할 겁니다.

17年夏入手的杀机，玩到现在已经快1年了。游戏体验良好，游戏环境不错，游戏质量还有待提高（比如说bug之类的）
由于最近第五人格的火爆，又迎来了一批新玩家，对于那些还在由于不决的萌新，我是强烈建议入手的，82块你买不了吃亏，买不了上当。
作为一个恐怖游戏（滑稽）来说，杀机的优势不少。
1.游戏玩法新颖，恐怖氛围极佳。
2.玩家素质尚好（守尸不算），目前没遇到过打完出来骂人的。
3.外挂不多，至少神仙不多，微调的话很难看出来，毕竟我不是人皇和屠皇。
4.官方对中国玩家很友好，点赞，顺便鄙视一下蓝洞。
但是缺点有，也很明显。
1.bug真的有点多，更新bug不是开玩笑的。
2.上手很慢，血点需求高，有点爆肝。
写了一些，最终加不加入杀机还是看各位的决定，但我还是强烈推荐的。
我觉得ok

卡   了
   炸

The game plays wonderfully, the mechanics and design of the game are great. The balance and exploits leave something to be desired. Visually and conceptually the game is pleasing and enjoyable and I don’t regret picking up or continuing to play this game. I enjoy this take on a horror/thriller style of game. Though I am only 70+ hours in I have already started to see a trend though, and it’s something that makes the game hard to play and its due to the number of exploitable parts in the gameplay.

The environments, most of them, have several spots in them that have what is considered a “Safe Zone”. This is a spot that is almost guaranteed to make it impossible to catch a survivor regardless of the bloodlust effect that is gained by the killer. It only takes a miss step by the survivor to get hit by the killer but in high level play this is unlikely to occur and I have been stuck in these loops often as the killer, where you will get pulled into a “Safe Zone” and if you disengage to chase another you will be pulled into another one quite easily. That and if you encounter a group of survivors that do nothing but hover around each other, catching one person and hooking them often leads to that person getting free quickly and before you know it they have all somehow managed to escape as even if you do manage to get someone in a “Save Zone”, this is only a distraction, this coupled with a few select over powered survivor perks and the killer just isn’t winning. This is only on high level play though that the survivors become nearly unstoppable.

In low level play, often times being the survivor becomes the difficult part, the game swings into the killers favor as your perks aren’t that good just yet and often times it is hard to pull one over on the killer, that being said the “Camping Killer” strategy is far too easy to preform, hook a survivor and just stand there or walk in a 10x10 area so you can get anyone that gets close to the hooked survivor. It doesn’t take much either as the survivors are meant to help each other. And before anything else is said I’m not even going to cover the body blocking exploit.

While the game is fun and enjoyable when you have a group of people who want to enjoy a game for the thrill over winning more often than not you get the situation of “I just want to win”. This means you get far too many toxic players exploiting the game to make sure they win and you end with one or more players having a bad time, and it happens far too often from what I have seen.

Final note: The game is great fun but often times you have to do the game in short bursts or know your limits for punishment as far as toxic players are concerned. It is a wonderful game to try and get into over all its fun but in the end, there is a lot of tweaking that needs to get done on a game that has been released for over a year now. But I still say play the game and enjoy it as much as you can, there are very few games that does this kind of atmosphere right and that is where the game excels.

TL;DR
Fun game, wonderful atmosphere for a horror game but the exploits and player toxicity is there in large amounts.

Meine erste Review entstand nach knappen 500/600 Stunden, zu einem Zeitpunkt in der es mehr Lobbysimulator als Gameplay war. Mittlerweile habe 2000 Stunden Spielzeit mehr und kann einiges sagen.

Dieses Spiel hat zwar einen Suchtfaktor, aber die Entwickler verderben den ganzen Spaß. Es ist leider sehr traurig wie sich das Spiel entwickelt hat. Man wartet teilweise sehr lange auf Patches die nötig sind! Es wurden Server angekündigt, damit die Killer nicht mehr die Hosts sind und siehe da, Hits sind nicht mehr legitim, Killer sind verbuggt ohne Ende, Alpha Wände sind auch vorhanden (teilweise die die eigentlich "entfernt" wurden). Mit den Servern kamen auch teilweise die tollen Lobbysimulatoren zurück, aber wenn wir schon bei den Lobbysimulatoren sind. MATCHMAKING! Ich bin jede Season im High Rank unterwegs und frage mich immer wieder wieso bekommt man als Rot Rangler Leute rein die im Rang 20 bis 13 rum tanzen? Auch die Gegenpartei tanzt des öfteren in so einem niedrigen Rang rum... Von der Balance in dem Spiel fangen wir gar nicht großartig an, außer mit den Worten dass es keine Balance gibt und sie nie geben wird, da immer eine und dieselbe Seite gepusht wird! Survivor werden stärker und starke Killer werden so generft dass man sie leider Gottes in die Tonne entsorgen kann. Auf die Community und erfahrenden Spieler wird nicht gehört, nur auf die lautesten Heulsusen mit der wenigsten Erfahrung. 

Sollte alles gewesen sein, ansonsten kann man ja bearbeiten ;D

去年打折60块钱时候买的，讲道理，除了买了二三十块钱的DLC之外。这个游戏是我花钱最少、游戏时间最长的游戏，没有之一。 守望和暗黑也玩，说是买断制游戏，但是氪了不少金...其他国产游戏就不说了，想想还是这个游戏性价比最高。。
     这个游戏带给我很多快乐和郁闷。 也认识了很多小伙伴（虽然他们很多人已经不玩这个游戏了），我记得当时最快乐的时光是周六周末4个人一起开黑，一起带4个紫罐，运气爆棚。。每个人从钩子上欧下来一次。。屠夫当时估计都傻了，哈哈。各种送快递 坑人，或者带魂牵梦绕风骚跑位。。
    也曾经遇到过好屠夫。 好屠夫会把只剩下一个人的我抱进地窖， 好屠夫看到萌新的我带魂牵梦绕的时候放过我（PY），也遇到过好的人，当时还是个0.4小时的菜鸡夹子屠夫，只能和人PY，PY完之后三个人类都跑了，只有一个人跑到地下室指着钩子让我挂他。游戏结束后我问他为什么，他说：pa ni fen bu gou  . 害得我感动好久。
    也遇到坏的屠夫，有次是个小主播屠夫， 因为我裂空，各种全场追杀我（当时我还是萌新，各种吓傻各种跑，哪儿敢搞事情），然后鞭尸我。 事后我去他直播间质问， 他说就只杀裂空的，搞笑。。裂空明明是网络冲突，又不是我愿意的，为什么把气泄在我身上？
    遇到个最变态的屠夫把我砍到后，在小白房门口和窗户放满了夹子，然后把我困在里面，让我摇下来，然后继续砍到我。。。当时我真是被吓傻了，后来一想，这个人真是变态。。。（我是怂皇，，从来不搞事情，只带医疗报，技能只带羽毛，自摸，弹射，和携手帮助）

    说了这么多，有点杂乱，我只希望杀机以后能越来越好吧。

---------------------------------------------↓↓↓2018/7/30更新-------------------------------

Dead by Daylight. Oh boy do I have things to say about this clown fiesta of a game.

This is a game stuck is perpetual state of constant brokeness. Whether it's balance and just spaghetti code, I've never seen it in a stable state. Sure it's seen darker times and it's seen better times, but it's never not been broken.

I hate this game. I really do. It has put me in mental states which I didn't think a game was capable of putting me in. I've met the dregs of humanity playing this game. I've played games with notoriously toxic communities. 500 hours in overwatch, an admittely brief stint in cs:go, etc. But holy shit, these games have nothing on Dead by Daylight. Particularly survivor mains. Most killer mains I meet are pretty chill. But survivor mains are actual scum. These are the most dense, sweaty, petty scum-lords on this plain of oblivion. Songs will be sung about the treachery of these nasty motherfuckers in the years to come. If you dare play killer in a way they deem ill manner (aka play the game as intended) these people open of the gates of hell on you in the post game chat. But it doesn't end there, these people don't just wish death upon your loved ones in the post game chat no no no. These people will leave comments on your profile expressing all the same wonderful rhetoric you'll soon get accustomed too. Some will even go as far as to add you as friends in order just to get another chance to convince you that suicide is the answer. I saved a 10+ minute conversation like this (which I sadly lost when I built a new pc).

Now for those who think I am exaggerating about how downright fucked this community can be. I challenge you to click on my profile, scroll down, and read the 500+ comments on my profile. Before I played Dead by Daylight, I had 3 comments on my profile. Now I have 500+ thanks to the dead by daylight community.


So what of the game? See the game is unbalanced to say the least, it (as in the balance) has been survivor favored for most of the game's existence. Not to say survivors don't have legitimate reasons to complain, they do. But hot damn they got it easy compared to killers. Killers serve a primarily reactionary role. Most killers in this game are incapable of making plays and rely on the survivors to make mistakes in order to win. Meaning that if the survivors do the objective and play optimally, most killers have no way of dealing with it. The two meta killers Nurse and Billy are a bit exception to this role. Nurse more so than Billy. Billy can make plays and better pressure the survivors with his chainsaw and Nurse requires the survivors to completely change the way they play in order to deal with because of her ability to go through walls and ignore pallets. But for the other 10+ killers? It's just a game of capitalizing on the survivors' incompetency and if they aren't incompetent, well.....you just kinda lose and you just kinda have to deal with it. And if they are stupid and get themselves killed in a especially stupid way, expect to hear the sound of meaty sausage fingers slapping on greasy mechanical keys as they type out 10 reasons you should consider necking yourself.

tl:dr play killer if you enjoy masochism.

As a side note, the devs are.....very stupid. Like how are these people even devs? If you want an example, they didn't and still haven't added in advanced graphical settings because they are afraid that it may "give some people an unfair advantage". So enjoy having only the option between  a low, medium, high, and ultra graphical settings because all those people with good rigs would certainly gain an advantage by adding loads of visual clutter to their screen in a game that relies on somewhat heavily on stealth right? That's the type of memery you can expect from behavior. They're really fucking stupid.

The redeeming quality of this game is that the entire concept of a 4v1 asymmetical horror is so good and so alluring. I mean when this game is fun, it's incredible. It's just the shit you put up between the fun. It also helps that this game has no competition.

So do I recommend Dead by Daylight? Yeah. Kinda. I'd get the base game on sale and try it out before you spend anymore of your mom's credit card. And if you are depressed, suicidal, or just thin-skinned, then just don't even bother. This community chew you up and shit you out.

But I made this review to let people like you, that other rando, that kid who is too young to be playing m-rated games exactly what they're getting into. And maybe it's for me too. Talking about this game has been like a form of theropy for me. Because I am in an abusive relationship with this game and it beats me everytime I boot it up. Hell, even my pc makes weird noises and heats up when I play this as if its asking: "why the fuck am I being forced to run this dumpster-fire?".

So yeah, there you go. Dead by Daylight in the perspective of me. I hope you're happy.

They will spam you with flashlights, block you from hooking your victims and rub their victory into your face (this happens everytime they win. I have yet to play a match where the survivors aren't complete trolls). All of this is simply not fun to play against. I know i shouldn't camp the hooks, but the survivors aren't giving much of a choise when they are literally forcing me to do so. Sorry, can't recommend the game.

很棒的一款游戏，从去年七月份开始接触到这款游戏，虽说游戏优化不是很好，但是制作组一直在努力将游戏做的更好，推荐大家购买来体验一下，很不错的一款游戏。

So this a game that is worth the money. It can be a bit frustrating initially, and there are scum survivors and killers at the low ranks. However if you get past that, then you'll find whatever you paid vs how much you play it gives you a great value.

On the flip side of this, the developers are more concerned at adding more content than fixing or balancing. They get things "working" and then release it, without what feels like the proper test scenarios. They are more than capable of doing public beta tests, but do so what feels like for hype.

This most recent release with the clown, they didn't "finish" before releasing. I've been grinding up points for purchasing perks when possible, or redeeming them for bloodpoints. They took this feature away, and haven't returned it yet. Even though the area for purchasing this is still there. In my past jobs, I got yelled at for taking away tools or features like this. Maybe they should be too.

But if you get beyond these gripes, it's still a good game.

Uno de los juegos mas interesantes Rpg shooter Sandbox una historia interesante en la cual consiste en: Tu protagonista una Actriz Porno conocida como chupalapichula es secuestrada por el malvado y temeroso dictador Chocola(sip la del nekopara v1) donde la seduce con su encanto de gata, nuestra heroina se encontrara con el gordo mas bonito de todos <3 el gordo TONY hawks , el cual cambia completamente el  juego volviendolo un juego muy bonito, su trama es mas simple de lo que parece, es sobre matar y avanzar mientras se la chupas al benja el negro mas feo, asi se me olvido decir que esta el negro salibon el del nekopara v1( vayan a leer ese analisis) el negro salibon al haber matado a barney y robar el dildo encantado de Rainbow Dash, sera el compañero de vida de nuestra heroina chupalapichula la cual tendra un lazo grande (como su pene) donde cada negro vivira alejado de los samurais coreanos entrenados en la isla pichulaconpan donde el ejercito sovietico de north corea es el principal enemigo de nuestra actriz porno ( invitados especiales: Mia Khalifa, Peta Jensen,Linda lovelance y John Holmes, todos actores de la industria porno). En fin una copia simple del Roblox pero entretenida saben Recomiendo 100% este gran MOBA

I really dont understand why people give this game bad reviews, they always say stuff like "it got boring", "too many bugs", or something about over-used strategies like pallet looping and camping.
but the thing is, if it "got boring" then you shouldnt give it a bad review, just stop playing it if you dont like it anymore but it used to be fun.
as for the bugs, i have played it for 67 hours and noticed very few bugs, like sometimes in the matchmaking the killer leaves right when you join so you just get instantly kicked out, but that isnt even really a bug.
and the whole "too many campers/pallet loopers" thing? camping is about one of the most easily counterable strategies in the game because if they are camping then you can just get all the generators and open the door, and by then the guy who is being camped is usually still alive. you can then just save him, take a hit, and run to the exit. pallet looping isnt easily counterable unless you play as huntress or nurse who can throw axe and teleport, however you can still counter it if you are another killer by destroying the pallet, they might get away, but you can just follow their tracks and they can never use that pallet again

ㅎ굿

I will say for now that the recommendation is yes. It seems to be a solid game however that being said alot of negative is going to follow. This review is mostly for players like me who came to the game very late in its release.


The game that grew to popularity from youtubers seems to be a bit more designed for fun with friends than general play. There is almost no semblance of balance and the progression system seems to be a bit awful. It is procedurally generated so you never know what you will get at what level in the blood web. It also seems to have no match making so if you are a new player this is one of many ways the game hates you. You will play against people with insane amount of perks and skills that far suprass your own. Never giving you a chance to learn other than being repeatedly curb stomped by much higher rank opponents.

As for the killer I highly suggest new players start as survivor for a long period before attempting because of the above reason. New players that start as a killer (such as me) and play against people with 200+ hours in this game I was lucky to land several hits really. Although I will say these survivors were amazing people and super polite which is why I stuck with the game. Minus the small toxic community this game has a VERY helpful group of people behind it which is suprising with modern gaming. 

The balance in this game is awful. However that being said there also does not need to be a harmonious balance in a game like this. My first few games as killer I took wraith because invisible sounded amazing. Then because of advice I went and tried trapper. It is night and day. Trapper is simply amazing compared to the loud tolling of the bell with negates the point of invisibility.  The survivors and their perks also are insanely different and some of them when played by someone competent are just so hard to truly stop with the amount of time they can waste from a killer. And as with all games the newer killers are quite strong especially for a period after release.


Now that the negative is aside some huge positives-
the community is amazing I cannot stress this enough.

The game does reward you for failing to escape which is helpful for new players because it means we will eventually come to stand with the multi perk players without relying on a hard carry.

Being a killer is quite fun truthfully which is the point of the game, to have fun.

The level design is actually a little more varied than I expected from a game like this.

The killers are feel very different as do the survivors. It is quite amazing and a bigger change than just looks.



My one and only pure negative in the game is also for new players- daily rituals

When you are new. Some of them are simply impossible. Anything that says escape three times is immedietly trashed. I have yet to play a game where even one person has survived so why would I even do this? Most of the rituals are simply not something that can be done by new players. Simply creating a larger gap between the new players and veterans.


Overall however the game is fun. Which is all that matters. That being said meet some nice people from the game and play with them.

Incrível! Um jogo sensacional! Recomendo a todos, pois é um jogo viciante e muito divertido de jogar!

LAST UPDATE: I fucking love to hate this game. It is beyong aggravating, however, victory is soooo sweet! It takes about 10-15 levels before you start performing better due to perks, items, and addons. The game is not very intuitive so it takes a lot of failure to become successful. After 14 hours I am now winning more than losing, but I still have some rough runs. The community in this game is dope, and if you have friends who play I would highly recommend utilizing discord. My only gripe now is that the Doctor is OP as fuck. Doesn't change how awesome this game is!

1st Update: After another 4 hours of game play, I'm still extremely frustrated with this game. The art is amazing, the controls are okay, but there is no balance whatsoever. In a coop game like this, that has to be the most important thing. Right now, the survivors seem to have a major edge. To name just a few major issues: 

1) NO FUCKING CHAT IN A COOPERATIVE GAME. You will play against people who are on discord and can coordinate better. This is giving a major boost to those who have friends who play this. I have a couple folks who play, and we demolish everytime because of this.

2) As a monster, when you hit a survior they get boosted away from you AND you have about a 3 second delay where you savor the attack. It needs to be one or the other, not both. This gives the survivors way too much of a chance to get away.

3)  Excape attempts from hooks only provide a 4% success rate. This should be around 10-15% considering it speeds up the process of the entity hooking you.

***If you are going to play, I would suggest going to the help/tutorial section. The game should start with the tutorial, but they just throw you into it making it a bit frustrating at first.***

1st  POST: Meh... there is no balance. My first run I started up 3 generators and escaped with little trouble. The next 2 rounds I died within 2 minutes of start. I was hoping for a horror game like this, but with more of a challenge on both ends, and no stacking against one or the other. As it stands now, I'm not liking the game. Visually it is dope. The mechanics are not to my liking. You get out run by the monsters, it isn't hard for them to search for you like the hints say, and the meter to struggle out of their grasps is insanely long. Needs more work. I might revisit. As of now, I paid $20 and feel like I wasted $15 of it.

A nivel de balance hay personajes que tienen un poder base demasiado fuerte mientras que hay otros que tienen un problema más que un poder(ejemplo: hillbilly)

anyways no está mal echar partidas de survi tbh, jugar killer no está mal pero según el personaje se recomienda ir con la mentalidad de que posiblemente todos no mueran porque volviendo a lo de antes, no es begginer friendly

a modo subjetivo añado que necesita modos de juego(por ejemplo unranked para probar builds), demos(para grabar las partidas ocurridas) y algún incentivo más allá de los puntos para jugarlo

Dead By Daylight - это:
- Когда ты взял престиж, но потом вспомнил, что у тебя были блуди пати
- Когда тебя фейскемпят из-за 360
- Когда абузят баг на кротусе, а потом пишут что ты нуб
- Когда ты летаешь по карте со скоростью флэша
- Когда ты спокойно чинишь генератор, без сердцебеения и колыбельной, и тут тебя хитует топор
- Когда в СВФ ищет лобби час
- Когда ты заАФКашил, а тебя уже повесили
- Когда слепишь маньяка на последних секундах фонаря
- Когда вся тима взяла топ итемы, аддоны и офферинги, а маньяк ливнул
- Когда маньяк взял красный топор, а ты ливнул
- Когда из профиля ты узнаешь многое о себе и своих родителях
- Когда сбросили ранги, и тебя не спасают с крюка в 5 метрах, когда маньяка нет рядом
- Когда попался маньяк 20, который даже не знает как повешать тебя на крюк
- Когда сделал -4 за 2 минуты, и тебя называют читером
Вообщем, топ игра =)

08.06.2019: Прошло много времени... Раньше это была хорошая игра, и осталось много хороших воспоминаний про неё, но уже более чем год назад из неё сделали абсолютный мусор. Слава богу, что люди начали замечать это, хоть и с огромным опозданием. Заметил кстати, что позитивные отзывы пишут только новички до 100 часов. В основном чем больше люди провели в ней раньше часов, тем больше они сейчас её ненавидят. Раньше я жил в дбд (2к часов считая все аккаунты), и не могу просто ничего сказать... Нет никаких эмоций к ней, но абсолютно точно рекомендую не начинать играть в неё. Разработчики не хотят понимать что они делают, пусть и не понимают. Как я и предсказывал еще год назад, игра скоро загнётся, и, кажется, это началось.

本人steam 上第一款收费游戏，评测纪念

注：以下观点均从个人角度出发，在意者不用继续看下去了，

“（）”为解释

优点：

不错的优化，（本人不开加速器可直连）

新颖的方式，（本人第一次见到这种躲猫猫的联机恐怖游戏）

团队联机互帮互助十分有意思，（本人觉得不错）

恰到好处的音乐，（同上）

制作团队对CN市场，对CN玩家很友好（杨教授DLC的发放）

缺点：

BUG多，

DLC很多，但实用价值......个人觉得不高（有限?）

各种刷血点的玩家导致萌新游戏体验极差（本人体验极差）

以上，是我自2016.8.24-2017.1.6   70+h游戏时间的感受，

由于时间的局限性无法给出更加深入的观点，仅供参考【=、=】
推荐和好友一起
很棒的一款游戏，能体验屠杀的快感，也有被追杀的快感，但被素质差的屠夫守尸，游戏体验感就很差。

Trotz einiger Macken und eigentlich permanent, überaus vielfältig auftretenden Bugs liebe ich dieses Spiel.
Es macht einfach total Spaß. Der Nervenkitzel als Survivor und die Genugtuung als Killer, wenn du einen frechen Survivor an den Haken hängst sind wirklich ein gutes Gefühl. XD

Mich stört ein wenig, dass Killer ihre Pips zum Leveln nur anhand gehängter, bzw. getöteter Survivor verdienen können. Das läd zum Campen ein, auch wenn jetzt wieder einige argumentieren "Dann macht halt Generatoren". Dennoch...ein Punktesystem, mehr nach Art der Survivor würde mir etwas besser gefallen.
